__data__.text: \# Windmills Real Estate Valuation Services LLC Address: 604, Al Barsha Business Centre, Al Barsha 1, Dubai, UAE Contact: +971 4 346 0290 Date: 1st March, 2025 Client: Lincoln Electric The purpose of this summary appraisal report is to provide the lender/client with an accurate, and adequately supported, opinion of the market value of the subject property. # Summary of Facts and Conclusion # General

__data__.text: \# Current listings/contracts The subject property is not currently listed for sale nor has it been in the 12 months prior to the effective date of this appraisal. # Local facts # Demographics This large, EPA-approved parcel is versatile and divisible in 5-acre parcels. Site accommodates heavy industrial, manufacturing, corporate, offices, flex space, wholesale, retail, storage, warehouse and shipping. Close proximity to highways. # Population As of March 2025, the population of Cleveland is 362,656. # Property Site

This table provides detailed information about a property located at 5000 Warner Road, Garfield Heights, OH 44125, owned by Lincoln Electric. It includes details about the property's description, assignment type, neighborhood, ownership, intended users, report and inspection dates, assessed value, taxes, and sale history.,
with the following columns:
- Property Name and Address: None
- Borrower: None
- City: None
- Property Description and Type: None
- Assignment Type: None
- Neighborhood: None
- Owner: None
- Intended Users: None
- Date of Report: None
- Date of Inspection: None
- Assessed Value: None
- Taxes: None
- Sale History: None

| Property Name and Address     | 5000 Warner Road                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|---|---|
|                               | Garfield Heights                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                               | OH 44125                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| Borrower                      | Lincoln Electric                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| City                          | Cleveland, Ohio                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Property Description and Type | This large, EPA-approved parcel is versatile and divisible in 5-acre parcels. Site accommodates heavy industrial, manufacturing, corporate, offices, flex space, wholesale, retail, storage, warehouse and shipping. Close proximity to highways.                                                                         |
| Assignment Type               | The subject property is being appraised ‘As Is’, Fee Simple interest.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Neighborhood                  | Surrounded by other warehouses and industrial units with open area. Located in industrial area. Property values here are increasing with high demand.                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Owner                         | Lincoln Electric                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                               | 22801 St Clair Ave, Cleveland, OH 44117, USA                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| Intended Users                | The intended user of this report is Lincoln Electric only.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Date of Report                | February 10, 2025                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| Date of Inspection            | January 21, 2025                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| Assessed Value                | $5,000,000                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                               | It is the appraiser’s opinion that assessed value has no direct correlation to current market value in the subject market area.                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Taxes                         | According to the City Tax Collector website, the 2023 taxes have been paid in full as of the effective date of this appraisal. No prior year taxes are reported delinquent.                                                                                                                                               |
| Sale History                  | As per city public records, the subject parcels were purchased by Lincoln Electric from another real estate company, PQR Real Estate Company on March 1, 1997 for a reported consideration of $785,000. This appears to have been an arm’s length transfer, at least nominally consistent with then-current market value. |
|                               | Parcels 05-1S-22-256C-0009-0010 and 05-1S-22-256C-0004-0010 were improved at time of purchase with some modifications.                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                               | Parcel 05-1S-22-256C-0003-0010 (1.44 ac), was subsequently developed in 2007 with the apartments.                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                               | No transfers of the subject property have occurred within the three years prior to the effective date of this appraisal.                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
